Intro.intro:
Hello, I'm Jason, a full-stack developer with 2 years of experience.

I enjoy exploring different challenges.

My focus is React (Next.js).

About.title: About Me
About.content:
After graduating with a degree in Information Management, I made the decision to follow my passion for programming. I honed my skills in frontend technologies through online courses, with a particular affinity for the problem-solving aspect of programming. There's a sense of accomplishment I derive from from successfully overcoming challenges. My core stack comprises React and Next.js, and I am consistently eager to explore and learn new technologies. I am currently in active seeking a full-time position as a frontend developer.

Outside of coding, I find joy in playing computer games and watching movies. Moreover, I have a deep passion for traveling around the world to discover and explore new experiences.

qrcode.title: QR Code Ordering
qrcode.description: I served as a full-stack developer in this project, developing corresponding features based on different ordering modes to provide catering businesses with QR code ordering services.

description.d_list1: Developed and maintained a restaurant POS management system, including QRCode Ordering.
description.d_list2: Developed and maintained an e-commerce website, assisting in the integration of third-party e-ticketing APIs.
description.d_list3: Integrated WebSocket technology to implement real-time calling functionality.
description.d_list4: Optimized web page speed and performance, enhancing user experience.
description.d_list5: Developed RESTful APIs for system functionality and authored relevant documentation.
